result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel Lopez

records.addlTxt:
Court is down and unable to hear this case.  Parties emailed new court date.  Defendant appeared by zoom and was given new court date.  Case adjourned, Br 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Daniel Lopez appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Daniel Lopez.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Daniel Lopez in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris.  Josh Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Defense is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Order Appointing Counsel, signed and filed.

Defendant Daniel Lopez in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appearing as a friend of the Court.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for status conference. Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation. Indigency Hearing held. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by the Court. Defendant agreed to repay Milwaukee County for the fees and expense paid by Milwaukee County. The Court appointed Attorney Harris to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour and defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month. Repayment to begin after the conclusion of the case on the 1st of the month and every month thereafter. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Daniel Lopez in court.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pretrial conference. Defendant does not qualify for PD representation. Court holds colloquy with the defendant. Court adjourns case to allow defendant to retain private counsel. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered the remaining cash bail to be returned to the remitter.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with C.G.F. (dob 11/26/1993) and E.H.F. (4/13/2002)
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Daniel Lopez in court.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 35.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel Lopez
Current: 701 Monroe Ave, South Milwaukee, WI 53172   (Effective: 04-14-2022)
Prior: 1324 South 11th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
